titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir George Booth to a friend of his shewing the reasons of his present engagement in defence of his countries liberties, &c.
titleStmt.author: Delamer, George Booth, Baron, 1622-1684.

notesStmt.note: In support of a free Parliament.
Signed and dated at end: George Booth. Chester Aug. 2. 1659.
British Library copy cropped at head, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
